intra_panel_references.condition: Visible and mandatory when 'Please choose the option' = 'Cancelled Cheque'
intra_panel_references.raw_logic: If process type is India and Please choose the option is choose as Cancelled Cheque then it is visible and mandatory. The upload limit should be up to 15 Mb. Perform the Bank OCR and get IFSC code and Account Number

intra_panel_references.condition: Visible and mandatory when 'Please choose the option' = 'Passbook Front Page (India Domestic and International)'

intra_panel_references.condition: Visible and mandatory when 'Please choose the option' = 'Cancelled Cheque (India Domestic)' OR 'Passbook Front Page (India Domestic and International)'
intra_panel_references.raw_logic: Non editable if cancelled cheque is selected. Editable for other option. Visible and mandatory for Cancelled Cheque (India Domestic) 2. Passbook Front Page (India Domestic and International). Otherwise invisible and non-mandatory. Auto-derived from OCR in case of cheque, manual entry in case of other options. Perform IFSC code verification

intra_panel_references.original_logic: If "Yes" then TDS certificate upload field is mandatory. If "No", field will be hidden. Upload size is 15 Mb

intra_panel_references.logic_source: If yes, Vendor will upload MSME Certificate and OCR will be performed post upload. Upload size is 15Mb
intra_panel_references.rule_expression: SHOW(__msme_image__) WHEN __is_ssi_/_msme_applicable?__ == 'YES'
SHOW(__msme_registration_number__) AND SET_MANDATORY(__msme_registration_number__) WHEN __is_ssi_/_msme_applicable?__ == 'YES'
SET_VALUE(__name__, OCR_RESULT.name) AND SET_READONLY(__name__) WHEN __msme_image__ IS_VALIDATED
SET_VALUE(__type__, OCR_RESULT.type) AND SET_READONLY(__type__) WHEN __msme_image__ IS_VALIDATED
SET_VALUE(__address__, OCR_RESULT.address) AND SET_READONLY(__address__) WHEN __msme_image__ IS_VALIDATED
SET_VALUE(__category__, OCR_RESULT.category) AND SET_READONLY(__category__) WHEN __msme_image__ IS_VALIDATED
SET_VALUE(__date__, OCR_RESULT.date) AND SET_READONLY(__date__) WHEN __msme_image__ IS_VALIDATED
SET_VALUE(__enterprise__, OCR_RESULT.enterprise) AND SET_READONLY(__enterprise__) WHEN __msme_image__ IS_VALIDATED
SET_VALUE(__major_activity__, OCR_RESULT.major_activity) AND SET_READONLY(__major_activity__) WHEN __msme_image__ IS_VALIDATED
SET_VALUE(__date_of_commencement__, OCR_RESULT.date_of_commencement) AND SET_READONLY(__date_of_commencement__) WHEN __msme_image__ IS_VALIDATED
SET_VALUE(__dice_name__, OCR_RESULT.dice_name) AND SET_READONLY(__dice_name__) WHEN __msme_image__ IS_VALIDATED
SET_VALUE(__state__, OCR_RESULT.state) AND SET_READONLY(__state__) WHEN __msme_image__ IS_VALIDATED
SET_VALUE(__applied_state__, OCR_RESULT.applied_state) AND SET_READONLY(__applied_state__) WHEN __msme_image__ IS_VALIDATED
SET_VALUE(__modified_date__, OCR_RESULT.modified_date) AND SET_READONLY(__modified_date__) WHEN __msme_image__ IS_VALIDATED
SET_VALUE(__expiry_date__, OCR_RESULT.expiry_date) AND SET_READONLY(__expiry_date__) WHEN __msme_image__ IS_VALIDATED
SET_VALUE(__address_line1__, OCR_RESULT.address_line1) AND SET_READONLY(__address_line1__) WHEN __msme_image__ IS_VALIDATED
SET_VALUE(__building__, OCR_RESULT.building) AND SET_READONLY(__building__) WHEN __msme_image__ IS_VALIDATED
SET_VALUE(__street__, OCR_RESULT.street) AND SET_READONLY(__street__) WHEN __msme_image__ IS_VALIDATED
SET_VALUE(__area__, OCR_RESULT.area) AND SET_READONLY(__area__) WHEN __msme_image__ IS_VALIDATED
SET_VALUE(__city__, OCR_RESULT.city) AND SET_READONLY(__city__) WHEN __msme_image__ IS_VALIDATED
SET_VALUE(__pin__, OCR_RESULT.pin) AND SET_READONLY(__pin__) WHEN __msme_image__ IS_VALIDATED
SET_VALUE(__district__, OCR_RESULT.district) AND SET_READONLY(__district__) WHEN __msme_image__ IS_VALIDATED
SET_VALUE(__classification_year__, OCR_RESULT.classification_year) AND SET_READONLY(__classification_year__) WHEN __msme_image__ IS_VALIDATED
SET_VALUE(__classification_date__, OCR_RESULT.classification_date) AND SET_READONLY(__classification_date__) WHEN __msme_image__ IS_VALIDATED

intra_panel_references.logic_source: If no, Vendor will upload MSME Declaration (Not Mandatory)
intra_panel_references.rule_expression: SHOW(__msme_declaration__) WHEN __is_ssi_/_msme_applicable?__ == 'NO'

controlling_fields.description: Primary controlling field that determines visibility and behavior of all other MSME-related fields

intra_panel_references.raw_logic: If duplicate vendor found based on 1. Duplicate GST 2. PAN Card 3. Email Id 4. Mobile Number 5. Bank Account Number then Exception duplicate vendor creation field is mandatory 6. Business Registration Number (Applicable only for Import and International)

referenced_fields.reference_context: mandatory condition - duplicate check based on GST
mandatory condition - duplicate check based on PAN Card
mandatory condition - duplicate check based on Email Id
mandatory condition - duplicate check based on Mobile Number
mandatory condition - duplicate check based on Bank Account Number

inferred_rule.description: Exception Duplicate Vendor creation is mandatory when any duplicate is found
inferred_rule.notes: Business Registration Number check also mentioned but applicable only for Import and International scenarios (cross-panel reference)

intra_panel_references.condition_logic: If YES, then visible and mandatory, else hidden
intra_panel_references.notes: Clear conditional visibility and mandatory dependency based on dropdown selection

all_controlling_fields.description: Primary controlling field that determines visibility and behavior of all other MSME-related fields
